elements.name: Add product to basket and verify

steps.name: User should launch Browser
User should enter url in browser
User should enter email address in text box
User should enter password in text box
User should click signin button
Verify you successfully login in
User should click on Hamburger icon
User should click on Shop
User should click Vitamins & Supplements in menu
User should click on the vitamins in menu
User should click on the vitamin C product
User should choose a product and click on add to basket button
User should click on Hamburger icon
User should click on Shop
User should click on Vegan
User should click the Vegan chocolate in menu
User should choose a product and click on the add to basket button
User should click your basket icon button
Verify the products present in the basket

elements.name: Add product to basket and verify
elements.description:
Given: User should launch Browser
    When: User should enter url "https://auth.hollandandbarrett.com/u/login?state=https://auth.hollandandbarrett.com/u/login?state=hKFo2SB4RUV2VWNRRml1UXdJZWFObGR4Z3cwMndfWHZubXoyc6Fur3VuaXZlcnNhbC1sb2dpbqN0aWTZIFNZb0tiX2l0UWxGN2RqWDNocUhGZmNLM3JpSVAxR05lo2NpZNkgSmwzRWF2a010RDNpcjhLOTNSTlM4TldBVVFKcks4bnI" in browser
    Then: User should enter email address "ashwinmurugan1@gmail.com" in text box
    Then: User should enter password "Ashwin@1100" in text box
    Then: User should click signin button
    And: Verify you successfully login in
    Then: User should click on Shop
    Then: User should click Vitamins & Supplements in menu
    Then: User should click on the vitamins in menu
    Then: User should click on the vitamin C product
    Then: User should choose a product and click on add to basket button
    
    Then: User should click on main menu button 
    Then: User should click on Shop
    Then: User should click on Vegan
    Then: User should click the Vegan chocolate in menu
    Then: User should choose a product and click on the add to basket button
    Then: User should click your basket icon button
    And: Verify the products present in the basket

elements.name: Login user with Valid Credentials
elements.description:
Given: Launch browser
	When: Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
	And: Verify that home page is visible successfully
	Then: Click on 'Signup / Login' button
	And: Verify 'Login to your account' is visible
	Then: Enter correct email address and password
	Then: Click 'login' button
	And: Verify that 'Logged in as username' is visible
	Then: Click 'Delete Account' button
	And: Verify that 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' is visible

elements.name: Login user with Invalid Credentials
elements.description:
Given: Launch browser
	When: Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
	And: Verify that home page is visible successfully
	Then: Click on 'Signup / Login' button
	And: Verify 'Login to your account' is visible
	Then: Enter incorrect email address and password
	Then: Click 'login' button
	And: Verify error 'Your email or password is incorrect!' is visible

elements.name: Logout user
elements.description:
Given: Launch browser
	When: Navigate to url 'http://automationexercise.com'
	And: Verify that home page is visible successfully
	Then: Click on 'Signup / Login' button
	And: Verify 'Login to your account' is visible
	Then: Enter correct email address and password
	Then: Click 'login' button
	And: Verify that 'Logged in as username' is visible
	Then: Click 'Logout' button
	And: Verify that user is navigated to login page

name: User Login and Logout functionality for Automation Exercise Application

steps.name: User should launch Chome Browser
User should enter url in browser
User should enter First name in Edit box
User should enter Last name in edit box
User should enter Email address
User should enter Confirm email address
User Should enter Create a password in edit box
User Should select Menus
Click on Create an Account button
System should display Account created sucessfully
Verify the title of the page

name: Create an Account for Holland and Barrett

steps.name: User Launch Chrome browser
User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"
User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"
Click on Login
Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"
User click on Log out link
Page Title should be "Your store. Login"
